snippet: Loui Eriksson scored the go-ahead goal with 7 minutes 34 seconds left, and Tuukka Rask stopped 39 shots to lift the surging Boston Bruins to a victory over the visiting Islanders for their ninth victory in 12 games.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat New York Islanders, 2-1; other hockey results noted.
lead_paragraph: Loui Eriksson scored the go-ahead goal with 7 minutes 34 seconds left, and Tuukka Rask stopped 39 shots to lift the surging Boston Bruins to a victory over the visiting Islanders for their ninth victory in 12 games.

headline.print_headline: Bruins Surge Past Islanders; Canadiens Throttle the Devils
headline.main: Bruins Surge Past Islanders; Canadiens Throttle the Devils
